text: Sim Teck Yi is a Singaporean footballer who plays for Home United FC as a Defender. He started his career with Balestier Khalsa in 2012. ==Career== Sim began his professional footballer in 2012 where he was in the Balestier Khalsa squad. After a year, Sim decided to sign for Home United in 2013. He later was then transferred to the Under-23 development team, Young Lions. After 2 years in the club, Sim returned to the Home United for the 2016 S.League campaign. ==References== Category:Singaporean footballers Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Home United FC players Category:Young Lions FC players
title: Sim Teck Yi
